content.detailedDescription: Driving down i 78 in new york seen a black boomrang object for a few seconds.It like turn invisable or cloak .
content.summary: Appear out of no where then just disappear

content.detailedDescription: I was at my mothers house in del rio texas, around 1:20-1:30am i got a call from my gf and went outside to smoke a cigarette. i walked outside and could see sumthing really bright from the corner of my eye. it looked like a really bright, white in color, star. it sort of had the shape of a light bulb..And sumtimes looked as if it was 2 lights really close to eachother. i tried to record it on my phone but it wasnt able to catch a good video of it, so i took pictures of it on my cell phone. i took pictures of the normal stars and you couldnt see them on my phone but when i took pictures of the bright light, you could see it on my phone. it looks like a bright white dot. i went inside to tell my brother what he thought of it and he came out with his digital camera and took a couple of pictures as well. then we went inside for about 20-30 minutes untill i went back outside to smoke another cigarette and noticed it was no longer in the sky. i kind of had a shockin sensation when i noticed that it was no longer there. i have about 8 pictures i took on my phone. i was lookin towards the direction of eagle pass tx., wich is south of del rio tx, and the location i was was on top of a hill with not many city lights so i doubt that could be an answer to the light in the sky but thought that it might be a sattelite.
content.summary: Looked like a bright white light that didnt move, like a really bright star. looked like a lightbulb

content.detailedDescription:
I was  home on leave from the u.S. navy between may 6-12, 1977. while home near kinder, louisiana, i went and met a couple of friends that were fishing in an irrigation canal about a mile north of town on green oak road around 4:00 pm in the afternoon. my friends were in a boat fishing about 100 yards from the road as i started walking down the canal levy to meet them. about half way to them, my friends started yelling like crazy for me to look up in the sky. they were pointing in the sky to the north of the canal, but i was unable to see anything because of trees growing nearby. i yelled back and ask what it was, and they were yelling that it was a ufo!

at that time, i started running toward them and looking through the trees  for an opening. as i neared my friends, i saw the object in the sky that had them all excited. it appeared to be a perfectly round silver sphere glowing against the cloudless blue afternoon sky. again i ask my friends what it was, and again they said it was a ufo as they paddled to the bank and told me to get in the boat to have a better look at the object. as we paddled away from the bank and sat in the middle of the canal watching the object for a few minutes it appeared to be getting somewhat closer like maybe it was drifting toward us slightly. i thought that possibly it could have been a weather balloon at that point, except for the fact that it was perfectly round and not long like a weather balloon and the silver glow of the object seemed far more intense that any weather balloon that i have ever seen reflecting the sun. the object became very stationary again and appeared to be the size of a quarter held at arms length. without any reference to the size of the object, i was unable to determine if it was the size of a basketball and was just above the grown pine trees, or if it was a mile across and two miles away. at it closest most stationary point, i remember remarking to my friends that there was something larger and transparent behind the glowing sphere in the sky. it was difficult to see, but there appeared to be a much larger transparent possibly saucer shaped object on top of the sphere. you could see the sky through the larger object, but you also see the outline of the larger shape above it as if you were looking through a clear glass object. 

about five minutes into the sighting, a smaller very intense red ball of light appeared at the bottom on the silver sphere that looked very much like a lit road flair without any smoke coming off of it. very slowly the intense red ball of light started to lower from the silver sphere and appeared to be held in position by a very fine dark line in the sky. the much smaller intense red ball lowered a distance about four times the diameter of the larger silver sphere and then stopped in the sky and remained stationary as the dark line that appeared to be lowering the object appeared to turn into ashes and fall from the sky. the lowering of the red object took 1-2 minutes.

over the period of the next five minutes, the smaller red ball of light started expanding and collapsing in size getting lighter in color as it expanded and redder as it collapsed. each time the red ball of light expanded and collapsed it remained larger each time and lighter in color until it was finally identical in size and color of the larger silver sphere in which the much smaller ball of light descended from. now the identical silver spheres of light sat stationary one above the other for another five minutes.

after five minutes, suddenly both spheres moved far across the sky to the west so fast that the eye was unable to see the movement. the objects were simply here and then all of sudden they were sitting far across the sky at a dead stop with a fine dark line in the sky from where each object was sitting connecting to were each object now sat. again, the fine dark lines in the sky appeared to turn to ashes and fall from the sky in a couple of seconds. both objects repeated these rapid unseen to the eye movements 4-5 times over the next five minutes leaving the fine dark line each time they moved back and forth widely from the east and west across the sky. each time both objects stayed perfectly spaced one above the other.

after five minutes of unbelievable and unseen movement and instant stops that lasted about a minute each, one sphere darted quickly out of sight behind the trees to the north and the other quickly cleared the eastern horizon in approximately two seconds. at least this time they were moving slow enough to actually see them move across the sky.

during the entire 20 minutes or so that we observed the object(s) moving or sitting stationary in the sky there were no noise whatsoever heard form them.

after both objects left the area, we quickly loaded up the boat and headed toward the home of one my friends in the boat that lived two miles north of our location. upon pulling up at my friends house, his younger brothers and sister came running up to the truck all yelling ���daddy saw a ufo, daddy saw a ufo���. my friend said, ���let me do the talking��� and then asked his dad what he saw. his dad said, ���that he had saw a ufo straight above his property for nearly ten minutes and that it sprayed spider webs every time it moved.���
when asked what he meant about it spraying spider webs, he said ���every time it moved it sprayed spider webs that fell on his property and completely covered his ten acre pasture so that it looked like it was totally covered by white frost���. he said that he tried to gather the spider webs up in his hands and it would melt in his hands as soon as it touched the skin. by the time we had made it to my friends home all of the ���spider webs��� had melted off of the ten acre pasture.

i then headed to town (kinder, la) to see if anyone in town had seen the ���ufo���. i met nearly a dozen different people shortly thereafter that i knew and they all asked, ���did you see the ufo��� before i would even have a chance to ask them. with so many people seeing the ufo, i figured that it had to be on the evening news so i headed home to watch it. nothing was mentioned during the newscast, but at the start of the weather the weatherman announced that 200 people had called the tv station (kplc) and reported seeing a ufo between kinder and oakdale, la (a distance of 30 miles). however, the weatherman then announced that it was not a ufo. he stated that the national weather service had called the station and said that it was only a ���special weather balloon that was equipped with rockets���. 

two days after the above sighting while riding with my brother on hwy 165 south of kinder. my brother ran his brand new ford ltd ii off the road, jumped out of the car and unto the hood yelling, ���i saw it, i saw it���.  thinking he had nutted up, i ask him, ���you saw what���. he said that he had just seen one of the silver spheres on the east side of the highway and that it had crashed into the rice field between the 3rd and 4th levy (maybe 100 yards)  from the road. he then attempted to enter the field, but i persuaded him not to enter the field as it was planted with young rice about 6 inches high and flooded with water. i assured him that if the object had crashed, we would have been able to see it from the road. i asked him if he had seen any water or mud come up from the ground when it crashed and he said, ���actually it did not look like it crashed, it looked like it went into the ground���. 

i was just wondering if anyone else had seen a ���weather balloon��� that could move across the sky in excess of 30,000 mph and stop and go in an instant without making any noise. i have been looking for another one for over 30 years without any luck.
content.summary: Multiple daylight sighting of spheres

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i stopped on the side of state highway 46 approximately 20 miles from titusville along side a treeless wide open vista looking in the direction of titusville along with five or six other vehicles with people waiting to view the most recent shuttle launch. 30 seconds or so before the launch ( we were listening to the count down on our car radio) my wife said "what is that?" and pointed to a large object, white in color hanging motionless in the clear sky approximately 20 degrees from where the shuttle would rise into the sky. she instantly knew it was absolutely something not normal and it was not moving at all. it stood out like a sore thumb, so to speak.  it was about the size of a quarter on edge held at arm's length and about the thickness of a 747 when viewed from 3 miles or so. i estimate it was about 20 miles from our location and must have been huge if viewed up close. after viewing it for 30 seconds or so the shuttle launched and our attention was diverted to the shuttle. we watched the shuttle go up until it was no longer visible approx. 1-2 minutes. when i looked for the ufo after the shuttle was no longer visible the ufo was gone.. zip. for it to vanish in that short of time it would have to have traveled extremely fast or cloaked as it did not come our way. i have believed in ufo's for a long time but my wife has been skeptical but she knows she saw something that was not conventional and should not have been there. i absolutely know many other people must have seen this object and that is why i am posting this to see if other people might write in to provide other witnesses.
content.summary: The ufo was a straight white line in the clear daytime sky ,approx. the size of a quarter held at arm's length

content.detailedDescription:
Time of incident:  9:35 pm,  thu may 22 22:31:18 edt 2008

location: south nashua, nh.  i was observing the night sky - looking
for various constellations and planets.

sky coverage:  mostly clear  (light occasional clouds could be seen)

airport traffic:  visible from kmht (manchester nh), kash (nashua nh)
and kbos n and w release patterns (boston ma).

constellations: big dipper overhead
planets:  jupiter (in e or se)

object location:  path looked like an arc that passed directly overhead 
from the w or sw through the big dipper to the e or ne until
out of view.

naked eye:  the object was bright white and shape was hard to discern.
binoculars (7x35) :  the object was bright white and shape was hard to discern.

object description: circular or nearly circular.  size was pea size.
it looked similar to a meteor but the object was larger, brighter
and had no debris tail.

height in sky:  5k to 10k  feet (or higher).  both size and height
are guesses - it was very hard to discern these attributes at night.
it looked like it was lower than the departure traffic for kmht and kbos.

airplanes (primarily jets with red, green and white strobe running lights) 
created a contrail, this object did not (none was visible).

noise was heard with the various jets in the air, this object
had no noise associated with it.


did anyone else notice the object?  was it space junk reentering earth's orbit?  or something else?
content.summary: Over nashua nh, white object traversed night sky sw to ne

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were outside on the back porch (from ashland, oregon it was south, southwest.) when he point out to me what a strange star. it was almost like a pulsar. i noticed that sitting in the exact same spot of about 5 min. that if that was a star it sure was moving fast?! then i said it was a plane my husband said that the navigation lights were not flashing at about that time it went up. it started to move in circles the looked as though it was going up a tunnel then disappeared. we were saying what in the world was that when just at that moment it reappeared and started to look like it was making a zigzag motion then again up and down. we sat and watched for sometime and called neighbors to go out and look. i was so excited that i woke up my sleeping child inside. it was extraordinary! sorry to say that the clouds came over and we were not able to see it again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Bright white light with tent of green and red was going up and down and in circular motion disappeared then reappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
It was spring may 1, 2004 after midnight; 1:15 am. i was on the back porch of the house property star-gazing.  i saw what i thought was a star suddenly moving in the very distant night sky. then it seemed to stop and then it moved again. i decided to get my camera and tripod and document the event. 

i guess i thought maybe it could be a satellite, but i didn't know. 

i never lost sight of the object and probably have over ten minutes of footage of whatever it is. 
in the footage there is a glow around the object as a result of the focus; and there are trees in the foreground to more clearly demonstrate the object's movement. 

note: i did not see a glow around the object before the achieved focus.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I captured a ufo on minidv tape with a tripod. first i was just star-gazing until one of them moved.  then i documented the movement.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in living room at the time watching a movie .My nephew and my son spotted a round orange ball floating across the backyard at first we thought they were just board and being funny until they got scared.So we looked and sure enough it was real what ever it was. we have only woodlands and swamp behind our house so we ruled out lights from nieghbors.The object floated around about 5 min or so and then it just disappered.It was about the size of soccor ball and was about 3ft above the ground.About 20ft from the back door. we have since moved away
content.summary: Orange sphere shaped object floating across the back yard

content.detailedDescription:
On october 15, 2004 at 1:45 a.M. friday morning i was going to bed and noticed an orange light that at first i thought was a fire but after watching if for a minute realized it was an orange saucer flying behind my home, coming from the north flying southeast. i yelled to my house guest who was in bed in his bedroom what i was seeing as i was rushing out for a better look at the saucer and jet. my husband in bed did not wake up when i yelled for our house guest.
my houseguest who is a retired navy petty officer and i went into the back yard for a better look at the saucer and jet flying less than a mile away from us at about 3000 feet, just above grants pass peak.
on the first loop it was one saucer and one jet, on the second loop it was one saucer and one jet. the next loop there were two saucers and two jets, after that on each loop there was another saucer and another jet. be a total of three saucers and three military jets. every half hour the saucers would come back as if circling a certain area in a set pattern.
ann said there was no fear, just many other emotions.��� i would have never thought i would have experienced this in my life time, it was awesome! i couldn't believe what i was seeing.  i laughed when the military jet was chasing after the saucer and it got really close to it and then the saucer took off so fast that no way could the jet keep up.  god that was funny as hell.���
the saucers with the jets chasing them were going towards jacksonville or, the town president bush was in and flew back again. 
this continued to happen several more times with the time intervals getting shorter. the loops started out at half an hour, went down to 20 minutes, then 15 minutes and then 10 minutes. at one point we saw a fighter jet refueling in the sky. 
the saucers made no noise but the jets were making a lot of noise.
ann watched the craft and jets for several hours before she became too tired to watch any more. ann went to bed and slept. it probably came back but i didn���t awake until my alarm went off to get ready for work.
sam watched them all night until first light when they flew away. sam is a retired navy petty officer. he had never seen any craft like the ones the jets were chasing all night. they flew faster than any plane he had ever seen. he watched the crafts and jets flying in loops all night so there was plenty of time to study the craft. he was surprised how the saucers would slow down and then speed back up as if playing cat and mouse with the jets which were going as fast as they could go.
sam thought it was cool and exciting to watch the craft and jets as they flew along their flight path.
content.summary: Military jets chasing saucers from one in morning till morning light

content.detailedDescription:
Here is how i explained it in an e-mail to my family.  i have not told anyone else because i do not want to be classified as a nut job.

last night, not a joke, around 1:30am june 2, 2008 i made a trip to the
pantry to grab a snack.  on the way back to my bedroom with powerbar in
hand i looked out the window slats by the front door to check on the
neighborhood (westerville, oh).  everything looked fine.  however, something in the northeastern sky caught my eye traveling from north to south.

a very large aircraft was flashing some strange colors and traveling at
a very fast speed.  i tried to focus on the typical white and red
flashing lights of an a usual airplane however there were none.  the colors hinted more to a red and multicolored very vibrant but distinct color flashing.  (logically, i thought perhaps it is a meteor, and i was about to call dad and val.  however, i know meteors are not long lived and i didn't want to miss it.)  so the meteor continued across the night sky at a very fast speed.

so next, the large meteor made several quick manuvers from straight to
almost completely parrallel to the previous position.  the meteor seemed
to be capable of making stairs in the sky.  moving again from the north
to the south to completely west to the south to completely west to the
south.  no human could have survivied the speed or the manuevers this
large aircraft was doing.  i can't even imagine the g-forces in which
the aircraft was under as it made the stair formation.  or what sort of
propulsion system allowed an aircraft/meteor to travel straight to
completely latteral in movement and then completely straight again.

at this point i noticed the meteor/aircraft (still very large and
flashing a distinct pattern of redish, blueish and purplish hues in
sequence) was tracking on what would be considered a normal airplane.
the airplane was the size of a fighter jet at very high altitudes.  the
fighter jet was pretty much a dot in the sky compared to the
meteor/aircraft.  it had the normal red and white flashing lights but
they were barely detectable.  the airplane was moving in an arced motion
in the atomosphere traveling from north to south.  

i noticed that the previous movements by the "unidentified flying
object" were to bring it on a direct intercept course with the (assumed)fighter jet.  the "ufo" then in close proximaty to the fighter jet attacked or something.  because in the spot of the fighter jet was a very bright competely circular light (just to the north and east of where the
fighter jet had been was a less dense red completely circular light.
they both held in place for approximately a second).  both lights
disappeared and there was no trace of the fighter jet where the white
circular light had been.  the "ufo" continued on its path with the same
flashing of vibrant colors for a short bit than vanished almost into
itself in the night sky.

meteors cannot make logical manuvers.  airplanes aren't that size and
don't flash those colors.  and if it was indeed an airplane where was
the sound?  also, who has the resources to build such a large aircraft?
it was definitely traveling faster than the speed of sound.  there
should have been a sonic boom at that speed.  unless what i saw happened
completely in outerspace.  how could it make those manuvuers?  how could
it just disappear into itself.  how could it make the red and white
circular lights appear and hold in place and then disappear?  and how
did it make the airplane disappear?  what happened to it?  what the
heck is going on?

in another e-mail i wrote:
i did find one thing interesting about my sighting.  everyone always says they can tell the shape and what not.  the lights from it were so bright i have no idea the shape of the ufo.  the damn thing was moving so fast there and cutting those stairs it could have been shaped as a round pile of crap for all i know.  what i do know for sure is that on june 2 at approximately 130am in the morning over the northeastern skies i saw a large ufo.
content.summary: June 2, 2008 ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I was a passenger in my mothers car heading south on country club road (cr 1378 fairview,tx)heading back from a meeting with a fire dept chief. as my mother was talking to me, i to be traveling at around a 20,000 ft altitude. there were no clouds in the air and saw an oval shaped object moving at a high rate of speed heading south. i initially noticed it with a viewing angle of approx 30degrees, 3-5 miles away. i told my mother to look in the sky, and said "omg what is that?" she was talking on the cell phone(driver), and told me to "hush" she did not see anything, nor bother looking because of traffic. my nephew however was in the back seat, and also saw the same object. as we watched it, i was amazed by the speed of this object. it was moving faster than anything i have ever seen in the sky. it kept its course and disappeared suddenly.

camera type: fuji finepix s7000 (no pics of ufo just used as a reference angle)

visual characteristics: oval white shaped orb, semi-translucent.
size: cannot accurately determine, but if you hold a pen vertically, it was about that width looking at it superimposed.

temperature: approx 95 degrees humid, no clouds visible in any direction.

sun loaction: the object was traveling south and the sun was setting west at a 45 angle. 

total viewing time 25 seconds

there were no obstructions to my viewing, besides a group of trees near the last moments we watched it. 
  
credentials:
i am active duty military on leave in texas. i work on aircraft, and have been on the flightline for almost 20 years. i am familiar with the flight patterns in my area as well. i am a prior certified aerial observer for helicopters. i have flown many hours as well.  

i am a veteran of somalia,and the gulf war, and am currently stationed on an active duty marine aviation base in arizona.

i did not have time to take a video or a picture because my camera was in the back seat under shopping bags full of clothing. 
i chose to go outside when we got home, and take pictures of the angle, as well as provide the exact location of the sun, to include the showing of an aircraft flying nearby which lands at dfw about 30 miles west of this location. i have a keen eye, and know aviation assets, as well as satellites, weather balloons and glare/light reflections from planes and the sun. i have never seen anything travel so fast. 
thank you for your time (gysgt usmc)
content.summary: White oval object spotted in north central texas

content.detailedDescription:
We live in dartmouth on the beginning of a street that starts at route six. we heard a commotion outside and i sent my boyfriend to investigate oddly our dog who always jumps at a chance to go outside night or day especially if my boyfriend heads outside was fearful to head out. upon investigation it became apparent that the disturbance was just a couple of rowdy neighborhood kids but as my boyfriend looked to the sky he saw two what appeared to be flying saucers hovering in the distant sky. which he called me  to come witness. unlike stars they both were clearly saucer-shape with what looked like tentacles of light coming from the bottoms of the crafts. think jelly-fish. both changed colors and moved back and forth on paths not any comet, helicopter or plane ever could maneuver . we got our video camera and from our bedroom window got about 15 minutes of footage of one of the crafts before our battery died in our camera. convenient i know but who keeps their battery fully charged in case of "video emergencies" the second craft was eclipsed by the trees in our back yard so we unable to get a clear view. 

i've never seen anything like this before. i'm not big into ufos but i don't ignore the possibility of life on other planets. i heard a couple of people at work talking about them so we're not the only ones to bare witness to them. i was just wondering if anyone else saw these things? i will upload the video when i get the proper software installed.
content.summary: Saucer sighting in dartmouth, ma

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were camping at elephant butte reservoir on may 31, 2008; we had enjoyed a day of boating on the lake and had come in for dinner and an evening around the camp fire.  there were five of us and we had just finished eating and we were all just hanging around camp, it was approximately 8:15 p.M., not quite dark yet, when my husband said "what the heck is that" and we all looked and in the northern sky was a very bright light.  no stars were out yet and it was just too bright to be a star.  my husband grabbed the binoculars and he could clearly see three lights, two on top and one on the bottom, in the shape of a triangle or upside-down teardrop.  the object never moved, it stayed stationary for approximately 15 - 20 minutes.  we took a lot of pictures; we lost sight of it after the sun went down.  none of us could believe what we were seeing. all of us looked through the binoculars and could see the three lights and it seemed to be changing color from a whiter light to a very reddish/orange light.
content.summary: Bright stationary object in new mexico sky

content.detailedDescription: Im lilly im 14 and i was sitting out my window on a number of occations when i have sin hovering objects they single out from starts they move around and some times i can watch them shoot back up to the sky. on one particular occation i just oppend my window and i saw a browny, greeny, goldy what looked like metal up close space ship going straight over my roof right next to my window i rubbed my eyes but it was still there i rached out for it to touch but didnt reach im sure it new i was teeas it soon speeded up. on another occation it was hoovering over the feild a little down the road. i have sin more then 1 in anight about 4at te most and thse are here most nights. when you first see one you think your mad you tell your friends and your parents but they dont belive you i honestly thought i was mad but the more and more i see it the more and more i belive it.
content.shape: Circle,  Cylinder,  Egg,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Hovering over the field and on another account over my roof.

content.detailedDescription: On the property of st. gerard (catholic church) taking some pictures of their festival set-up.   3 june 08  @ 1415hrs.  about 45 min. to an hour later a friend pointed out a spot in a picture that we couldn't figure out or identify./...        in the sequence of pictures there is a picture before and some after this one.....       no spot....
content.summary: Unknown spot in picture

content.detailedDescription:
It was a very cool and windy day, and it was predicted that the district of columbia would have severe rain and thunderstorms over the next 24 hours. the sky was dark and we were rushing to finish our laps on the track before it started to rain. when i was on my 4th lap, my attention was immediately drawn upwards to a dark object that was gliding gracefully in a circular pattern in the sky ahead of me. initially i thought it was a large bird, but when i actually took a good look at it, i realized that it was shaped like a maltese cross. my running partner also stopped and looked up to see what i was staring at, and exclaimed, "wow, what's that?!?" 

it only glided in the circular pattern for a few seconds, and then crossed overhead in a smooth arc-like pattern towards the direction from which we came. as we watched it take it's path, it seemed to tumble in place a few times.

the path of the oject was absolutely smooth and precise though. it was not erratic despite the fact that there were heavy, choppy winds, and that we had been running against resistance the whole time we were on the track. it also did not change it's height in the sky. all it did was gain horizontal distance. i could not tell if there was any sound coming from it beacause it was so windy outside.

we were in awe, intrigued, but frightened at the same time. i have never seen a craft like that in my life. it kept gliding peacefully behind us until we could no longer see it.
content.summary: Was running on the track when a neighbor and i saw a dark maltese-cross like flying object overhead

content.detailedDescription: Leaving port st joe early morning hours driving toward either panama city or pensacola with windows down in car. could see the beach through pines trees along coast and noticed three conical shaped lights of white, green and yellow shining down onto beach in a rotating pattern from above. slowed car to 30 mph to see where the lights were coming from and about 100-150 feet over beach saw large cigar shaped object that looked like it had a hammered black hull. drove along side it for about 30 minutes listening for sounds which there were none coming from object just shining lights around onto beach. noticed at an angle slightly ahead of object that there were two cigar shapes and had two common "bridges" connecting them. as far as i can remember we drove on away as it slowed just know we were at our destination without having discussed it much other than it was strangely large and quiet. next day newspaper had article about hundreds sighting ufo near ocala but we never looked to see where ocala was on map just figured we had seen something we werent sure about. i can draw it from memory but have no way to get it on to my computer at this time.
content.summary: Two cigar shapes side by side w/common bridge connecting objects

content.detailedDescription: I noticed the object changing colors from bright white, green then bright white, then green, then bright white.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in alaska

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home down shaw hill road (rindge))from the top of cathedral rd when i saw through the dark, a car parked at the bottom of the hill with only one headlight on.  although it was parked on the opposite side i slowed down because it was at the lowest point in the road and i couldn't judge exactly where it was until the parking lights went on, they were bright lozenge shaped red lights in front of the car.As i passed the suv i noticed a person standing in the road in front of the car,i am not sure if there were two, and he suddenly lit up so that i could see him/her in a head-to-toe rain gear outfit.  the head was covered with a very distinct rain hat so that the face was too dark to make out.  i also noticed a flashlight that was just a glowing half dome on a stick like a microphone.  i noticed but didn't think anything of it then, there was no beam of light coming from it.  the rain suit had reflective stripes running lengthwise sparekley so that i rationalized that the sudden light i saw was the reflection from these stripes once the parking lights came on and i saw the "flashlights". as i passed the suv i glanced to see the people inside and saw what looked to be two ordinary people.  a man in his mid 50's was in the driver seat, staring straight ahead with no facial expression but i couldn't make out the passanger.  what struck me as odd was there being another person standing behind the vehicle dressed exactly the same as the one in front.  
i figured since they weren't police [there were no other vehicles] they must be trying to help the car that had only one headlight.  it had been raining earlier so the wacky rain gear didn't seem so odd after all.  that is until i looked back in the rear view mirror and saw the one standing in back, move out into the road and start looking for something on the ground.  again i noticed that i saw no beam from the flashlight, but i could make out that it was dressed in a silver jumpsuit with reflective bands and a helmet hat.  as i pulled away i couldn't help wonder why these two people would still be wearing rain hats when it wasn't raining and where did they come from? maybe they were taking a walk and came upon the car, but identical head to toe silver jumpsuits in rindge?And those beam less flashlights were interesting.
content.summary: Saw two individuals, car parked on road panel with hazmatappearing raingear,with verticle reflective stirpes with microphone shape flashlight with no beam

content.detailedDescription: While standing outside smoking outside the rear entrance to the funkhauser building on the campus of the university of kentucky, i noticed a plane leaving a contrail in the southern sky. i looked to my right and noticed another shiny object that kind of reminded me of the plane on my left, leaving no contrail. i looked back at the first object and when i returned to the second it had gone missing. the sky appeared to have very few to no clouds that day, and the area of observable sky was very large for the apparent speed the object had. the object appeared to be proceeding in a north - north easterly direction in a steady rate of movement. afterwards, i called my wife and told her about the incident. it was an interesting experience, but i am still not sure if what i saw was a ufo or some other explainable phenomenon.
content.summary: Spotted ufo while standing outside

content.detailedDescription: I was taken pictures of wind generators in kaliakra, bulgaria, during a small vacation with friends. the objects that appear in pictures were not seen in the moment of photographing the wind generators. i observed the objects in the moment that i download the pictures on my computer and start zooming. please advise your opinion in this subject.
content.summary: Picture of  ufo with few others objects in background

content.detailedDescription: Object was observed while seated in parked vehicle in large, private business parking lot facing east looking out windshield during bright, cloudless afternoon conditions.  driver's side door was slightly open as it was warm.  witness was wearing polarized sunglasses and observed object traveling into field of vision from north to south (left to right) for at least 20 seconds about 200 feet altitude or slightly above a four story building.  attention was drawn to object due to its immense size (spanned over 300 feet) and low altitude.  speed appeared to be similar as commercial aircraft as observed in high cruising altitudes and no noise was detected.  color was light gunmetal gray metallic and had dull magnesium-like coating appearing fluid-like or liquid, changing shades of light gray or having a cloud-like haze surrounding it.  witness was talking on cell phone to relative at the time object appeared in line of sight and reported sighting to her.  out of fear and disbelief, witness remained on phone as long as observation took place, describing series of events.  when object was directly in front of line of sight, angular, multi-wing shape was observed most clearly with well-defined, transparent, glassy, dome-shaped canopy on top toward front, very round, like a soap bubble.  canopy seemed large for the overall size of the object, occupying approximately one-tenth of object's size and was about double in height as compared to the width of the object.  width of object appeared to be similar to commercial jet (727 is 34 feet) and was about one-tenth the length of the total object.  shape of object was a five or six-pointed star/chevron/hexagon and construction was slightly faceted (not smooth) in appearance.  although object did not have a smooth surface, it reminded witness of a stingray animal as it was flat with ample surface area, had larger angular wing-like structures in center, and smaller angular tail-like wings pointing from rear.  there were no smooth curves visible except for canopy.  shape was difficult to determine due to object being parallel to line of sight and object could have been morphing.  surface appeared to be constructed from multiple portions of metal sheeting as seams and ribs were evident but no rivets were visible. no lights, mirror-like appearance or shininess were observed.  overall appearance was of a fluid-like dull metallic which witness had never seen before and has difficulty describing.  when first observed, thought object was military craft (usaf b2-spirit-shaped, except did not have as thin of nose and had a very visible canopy) until removed sunglasses (high quality non-prescription polycarobonate custom-crafted at optical shop) to attempt better view and object seemed to disappear as if cloaked.  faint, whitish outline could still be seen without polarized lenses.  replaced sunglasses and object reappeared with remarkable detail as originally observed.  witness removed and replaced sunglasses quickly in succession at least three times when first observing object and then removed and replaced glasses again toward end of sighting.  toward end of sighting, witness became startled when commercial jet was observed in 45+ degree angle of ascent (taking off from nearby airport) and approached flight path of unknown object as it appeared there would be a mid-air collision.  jet flew less than 20 feet above object, crossing over perpendicular (from east to west) to object's path and witness was able to calculate size of object as at least three times the length of the average-sized commercial jet's wingspan.  jet was on high angle take-off and was traveling slightly faster than observed unknown object.  object never deviated from path and remained constant in altitude.  witness exited vehicle after losing sight of object to the south, most likely due to pollution haze, and walked inside building.  witness reported sighting to co-workers and later in the week to security personnel assigned to the building.
content.summary: Daytime near airport sighting. dull metallic gray angular chevron object with transparent canopy.  no lights.  300+ feet length. 200+ feet altitude. visible only with polarized lenses.

content.detailedDescription: Reviewing some previous data i came across this interesting ufo taken over albuquerque at 3am.  there are two images taken a few seconds apart.  they both show a bright plasma ufo but the second one shows that some kind of plasma was ejected from the main craft.  the two images are registered together using the star field so there is no relative motion between the two images.  the ejected plasma cannot be due to camera motion as all relative motion has been removed.
content.summary: Ufo ejects multi-colored plasma

content.detailedDescription: My son, his friend and i were returning from a trip to bahia kino mexico and were intending to stop and camp in truth or consequences.  my son noticed the bright light and pointed it out to me.  i told him to grab the binoculars and look at it because it was not a star.  he told me that it was a cone with lights on the corners.  we were about 10 minutes out of t or c so i immediately pulled over and began taking pictures with my nikon 200mm.  it was north of us close to where we were going to camp so we headed towards it.  about 5 minutes south of t or c my son told me it was turning red and beginning to move.  i stopped the vw camper and had time to take one picture during the red shift just before it vanished.  i did not see it leave as i was trying to get a second shot.
content.summary: Conical shaped plasma ufo with lights on corners

content.detailedDescription: I went to college on may 15 2008, i have night classes and they last from 6 to 11:30pm. after computer class my friend went to talk to the teacher about about a computer problem at home at home, and myself being skilled with computer went up to join the conversation, to see if i could help. well one thing lead to another and we got into a detailed conversation "the 3 of us" about topics like "the government, ets, anti-gravity, and the north american trade union" not typical topics discussed at school, but it was after hours everyone left to go home, my teacher was basically just listening to our thoughts, ideas, and theory's. well i decided to call it a night and head home, my teacher and friend remain inside school to keep talking, i walked out the door to the courtyard witch connects to the parking lot witch only had about 4 cars in it, it was about 11:50pm "i stayed after school about 20 min. inside" as i crossed the courtyard to the parking lot i was about 10 yards from my truck, i constantly look at the night sky when im outside, something my father got me doing, being interested in ufo, i fittled with my keys and then i looked up because i saw a faint light above me, as soon as i looked up my eyes focused on a huge star like light about my head "i could of put my hand up and the star like light would of perfectly fit in my, hand size wise" if could take a guess, it was about 130-150 feet above me, hovering "silently". what i found really surprising and a second time experience for me, this star-like object when i looked up at i instantaneously accelerated to a speed that to me, was impossible. this encounter had a duration of around 7 seconds from seeing the light above to almost missing it take off by blinking. it seems, as soon as i focused on it, i took off. after this i had no missing time.
content.summary: Walked out of college late at night looked up and saw a huge bright star that instantly shot off!

content.detailedDescription:
I took this photo in jacksonville, fl on may 4th, 2008 at 4:27 p.M. with a nikon coolpix 5900, without a tri-pod. i did not see anything unusual at the time, but i���m near-sighted, so maybe i would not have been able to. after i noticed these images in the photo, i took pictures of birds, and various types of airplanes and jets from a distance. i was trying to reproduce what showed up in the picture. birds were recognizable and planes came out more spherical, probably due to either the motion of the plane or of my hand. that leads me to believe that whatever it is, was more stationary or slow-moving. it could mean something was on the lens, also. i don���t know. the photos before and after this photo was taken, were taken within the same minute and of different areas in the sky. there were no mysterious objects in those photos.  i have limited knowledge of digital cameras and would like to know what could have caused these images. please write me back with any information or thoughts you may have. the first photo (023.Jpg) is the unadulterated original. i will swear on my life to that. the rest were photo-shopped in an attempt to get a better look at the images. what i did to those are as follows: 

 

picture023 (3) - cropped



picture023 (6) - auto levels- (i don���t even know what that is)
content.summary: Strange images. if there is a digital camera problem that could cause this, let me know.

content.detailedDescription:
It was summer, i know that, we had the windows open, i shared a bedroom with my brother. he slept next to the window and called me over - i remember he and i looking at this saucer - it must have been 60 feet in diamater, probably 12 feet thick - perhaps more, ringed with red/black lights, and underneath four larger light panels flashing primary colors.
i vaguely remember thick glass panels with humanoids looking out of the craft.

i estimate we were less than 40 yards away from the craft, hovering silently. i remember both of us breaking away from the window and running to our parents, who were disturbed that we were awake and wouldn't listen to our story.

i was about 5 at the time, my brother was 7.

we were both stunned - not even knowing what we were looking at - it was years later that the term ufo was heard by me - and i knew then that's what we saw - a ufo.

my brother and i spoke about the event often. funny, we both experienced regular ( he more than i ) nosebleeds after that for many years.


i've seen 2 now, the other in 1988/89 i was about 28 years old - i was in a field in macon, ga at night, and a silent rectangular craft passed overhead - again it was 20-40 yards away from me. about 50 feet long i guess 20 feet wide and perhaps 20 feet tall. many odd shaped lights surrounded the craft. this was around 9:30 at night - i was out in the field because a very rare occurance of the aura borealis was present that far south the night before, and i wanted to get away from the city to see if it re-occured.

i saw it approaching - at first at a distance it looked like a small plane but it moved very slowly - and didn't make any sound. i watched and watched and wondered how it could fly so slow - thinking perhaps like me they were out and about looking to see the aura borealis too - but this 'plane' was coming at me in a straight line - but oh so slow.

it was strange - real strange - very quiet - very still. object just passed overhead at about 30 mph - not a sound - just kept on moving until i lost sight of it.

these aren't teeny tiny objects seen from a great distance - these craft (both of them) were seen at very close ranges - tree top level - very very close by - not to be mistaken by any other object or event.
content.summary: Observed a saucer hovering above trees outside bedroom window

content.detailedDescription: I took this pic back in 05 while visiting my decease parents at mesa city cementary, on top left corner of pic theres two oval shaped objects, i was leaving the cementary at the time i took this pic, if you look straight down the road you will see hohokom park, home of the chicago cubs spring training, but there was nothing going on there at the time, spring training had ended, and when i took this pic there was nothing there in the sky at the time...
content.summary: Two oval shaped objects over cementary...

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a red orb pulsing in the distance bout 15-20 degrees off the horizon..930pm...West over rocky mountains.
video.
content.summary: Red fireball over rocky mountains. video footage. disapeared in a flash.

content.detailedDescription: Saw a red orb pulsing in the distance bout 15-20 degrees off the horizon..930pm... i have a video of this thing.
content.summary: Red fireball over rocky mountains. video footage. disapeared in a flash.
